title: Kara Nichha's Sharp Sharp Strictly Vegetarian
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Fast food, Take-out
description: In the WITS student centre, this take away restaurant has queues that as long as the centre itself at lunch time for its inexpensive vegan curries. Go before the rush at 1:15pm or after the rush from 2:15pm. Reported that samoosas have cheese, Oct 2014.
streetAddress: The Matrix, East Campus, University of the Witwatersrand
